God, as much as Manhwa hentai artists style is amazing + it's color and this one is even uncensored it's really the best if you just find good looking pages and don't touch plot. 
They "threaten" you with something that could be amazing story and sometimes pretty good concepts, but man their plot writing suck, and the MC in every erotic manhwa is dumber than Shirou from Fate or Season 1 Subaru from Re:Zero which is pretty much negative IQ. Assaulting chicks and wondering why they are mad, sleeping with several different chicks and being angry at one that she dares to be with someone who doesn't treat her like fucktoy? Being completely indecisive fuckboy constantly telling your partner that you are with her only for sex until she finally decides to move on and then when she's with someone else finally telling her to be with you because you love her? Honestly, don't read any erotic manhwa for the plot, pretty much all of them are the same and all of their plot are terrible and MC's suck.
